data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 443,561 believers in Uasin Gishu, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Uasin Gishu, Kenya
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Uasin Gishu, Kenya to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.section_summary: On average, 116 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Uasin Gishu, Kenya.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, please help the 443,561 believers in the state of Uasin Gishu to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, let the threatened of Uasin Gishu, Kenya know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Orma people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Uasin Gishu, Kenya.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Uasin Gishu, Kenya with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Uasin Gishu, Kenya to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

location.name: Uasin Gishu
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Hadrami, Chinese, general, Gujarati, Hindi, Munyoyaya
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab, Hadrami (13,000), Chinese, general (35,000), Gujarati (212,000), Hindi (6,700), Munyoyaya (2,100)
